name: Soo...the chicken came first?
description:
Every end is a new beginning!

Collect all the worms and 5 SUPER WORMS worms... worms!

Burst out of your egg! Jump into action as young chick and Fly into the horizon as a chicken, in this chill collectathon.

Linux, Windows, Mac and Web uploads :D

Source 

https://github.com/stagfoo/GodotJam20

HTML version 
(its super slow to load and there is loading bar but runs very well.)

https://sothechickencamefirst.surge.sh/

Music by Ben sounds and SFX by freesound.org
